column4: It should be under the gear, on the right from where you enter you password.
install this sudo apt-get install gnome-session-fallback
I know how to click on the gear and select GNOME Classic, my question is how can I avoid having to logout, click the gear, select GNOME Classic and login again. My computer automatically logs in.
I believe I already did that which is why GNOME Classic is shown in the list in the first place, right?
